name: Real Deer Hunting: Hunt In Deep Jungle
name_original: Real Deer Hunting: Hunt In Deep Jungle
description:
Description: The hunting game includes 6 animal regions (Bear,Boar,Deer,Rabbit,Fox,Hayna),First person Controller on mobile ready ,Hunt different Missions of Beasts and level ups and unlock other ounces. Youn can hunt in neight with infaread camera with extremely zoom diffrent missions in neight and day show your skills if you are a hunter.

A best Sniper game with different styles and specification of guns that you will need inside jungle hunting. Deer and wolves take one shot to put down. But when you get to the bears. It’s going to take 2. Be careful. If you miss the noise will make them go running.

Features

Amazing 3D graphics and 3D Guns
12 huge levels. Each with a new challenge
Real sniper physics
Best Sniper Shooting Experience in Forest
Dangerous Realistic Forest Environment
An ultimate hunting action
Game play is simple yet entertaining
Efficient gun control
True to life hunting experience
Different animals to select as target
How To Play:
-Swipe on Screen to Aim your target
-Hit fire button to hunt.
